desc.lens: inside the white PRX4 Transporter. Used for the Photobomb Challange
desc.remoteexplo: needed for the Photobomb Challange, also unlocked at Mastery Level 20
desc.dongle: in the attic, used for ... - also complets the The Key to the Auction Challege
desc.invite: With this Invite you can enter
desc.invite-2: and then go upstairs to the Auction
desc.killpoision: Poision that kills instantly. Only here when you visit this Room disgusied as Kruger and talk to Dalia
desc.evacplan: needed for the Safe Room Explosion Assassination Challange. Take the Plan, kill Victors Bodyguard, take is Phone, use it and Kill both targets.
desc.stageschedule: XXX - also complete the Ducks in a Row Challege
desc.barenukcle: Use a waiter disguise at the Bar to poisen the Target Victors
desc.bootkey: use it to escape with the Speedboat here XXX
desc.viplist: with the Invite you can get the the 3th Floor to the secret Auction

desc.Tasteless: join Dalia disgusied as Helmut Kruger
desc.HurtThemselves: poisen them and follow them here. Works with both targets XXX
desc.Piano: poisen them and follow them here. Can be completed by other things too XXX

desc.chamelion: not 100% sure if you need the Vampire Disguise too, can someone verify? XXX
desc.wish: trow a coin in the well
desc.party: you should have this if you start this Level
desc.invited: get the Invite and pass here or at the Stairs to completed this Challange
desc.reaper2: reach this place with your 47 Disguise to completed this Challange (you dont need the invite)
desc.undercover2: Get the Kruger Disguise, meet with Dalia here to completed this Challange
desc.Piano47: use the Piano to lure a Waiter here, as soon he fixes the Piano use it again to complete this Challenge
desc.fire: pick up the Remote to completed this Challange
desc.salut: press to Button (at any Location) to completed this Challange
desc.quickbreak: use the Laptop Dongle at her Laptop to completed this Challange
desc.excellency: attend as Sheikh al-Ghazali to completed this Challange
desc.iagoatwork: reach this place to completed this Challange
desc.marker: Marker here for tracking purposes (right click to mark a Challenge as completed)
desc.boat2: Key to use the Boat Escape
desc.vase: destroy the vase to get the Feast completed

desc.Showstopper: Assassinated Viktor Novikov in a light rig accident. (Secret)

desc.Drowned: get the recepe, dress as a waiter, use rat posion XXX
desc.svedanja: Get the Ecacuation Plan, kill Victors Bodyguard, take is Phone, use it and Kill both targets at the Saferoom
desc.photobomb: get the Remote Explosive from the Security Room in the 3th Floor and blow it when the Reporter talks on her Phone
desc.watchyourstep1: Can be done on serval places. You can shoot the cable, use the Button or Shoot the Button to drop the Caladier
desc.knockedoutpunch: get the XXX Disguise, meet with XXX get the Poisen, Disguise as a Bargeter, get the Recepie kill Viktor with the cocktail XXX
desc.touche1: best done here, while they are ratpoisioned
desc.touche2: best done here, while they are ratpoisioned
desc.suit: Challange is bugged, cant be obtained (Xbox Patch 1.0)
desc.seine: use the A Private Meeting Opurtunity, after that Vitor will wait here for you ;)
desc.speaker: There are at least two Speakers that you can drop, one at Stagefloor and one at the balcony.
desc.chandelierdaila: can be easily done while she talks at the Auction. Go behind the Foodtable and drop the Caladier
desc.raper2: go upstairs, let her star the Auction and run over the attic in her Room. Shoot her with the Pistole from the Bathroom
desc.powdering: get Ratpoisen and dress as Palacestaff. Wait here for Dalia and the follow her
desc.velocity: get the Fireworksremote [here] and use it and then follow Daalioa and push her after she smoked
desc.posiondalia: Get the Kruger Disguise and wait here for her to show up, she give you a poision. Use it in the drink while she talks on the phone
desc.Barganined: Get the Kruger Disguise and wait here for her to show up
desc.saferoom: use the Firealarm and follow them (or plant the explosive before) in there saferooms
desc.Showstopper: Assassinated Viktor Novikov in a light rig accident. (Secret). A Tool is on the near the lightrig
